config.onekeyminer.title: OneKeyMiner Config
config.onekeyminer.info: Edit the config file to change settings
config.onekeyminer.enabled.tooltip: Whether to enable vein mining functionality
config.onekeyminer.option.chainMining.to: Whether to enable ore chain mining functionality
config.onekeyminer.option.chainLogging.t: Whether to enable log chain chopping functionality
Whether to enable crop chain planting functionality
config.onekeyminer.option.activationMode: Choose how to activate vein mining (can be combined with sneak condition)
config.onekeyminer.activationMode.toolti: Choose how to activate vein mining (can be combined with sneak condition)
config.onekeyminer.option.requireSneak.t: When enabled, sneak key must be held in addition to activation mode
config.onekeyminer.requireSneak.tooltip: When enabled, sneak key must be held in addition to activation mode
config.onekeyminer.maxBlocks.tooltip: Maximum blocks per vein mining operation
config.onekeyminer.maxDistance.tooltip: Maximum search distance for vein mining
config.onekeyminer.option.shapeMode.tool: Choose the search shape for vein mining
config.onekeyminer.shapeMode.tooltip: Choose the search shape for vein mining
config.onekeyminer.option.checkToolLevel: Whether to check if tool can properly harvest the block
config.onekeyminer.option.consumeDurabil: Whether vein mining consumes tool durability
config.onekeyminer.option.oreBlocks.tool: List of ore block IDs that can be chain mined
config.onekeyminer.option.logBlocks.tool: List of log block IDs that can be chain chopped
config.onekeyminer.mineAllBlocks.tooltip: When enabled, all blocks except blacklisted can be chain mined (whitelist ignored)
config.onekeyminer.allowBareHand.tooltip: Allow triggering chain mining without holding a tool
config.onekeyminer.teleportDrops.tooltip: Chain mined drops go directly to player inventory
config.onekeyminer.teleportExp.tooltip: Chain mined experience is given directly to player
config.onekeyminer.consumeDurability.too: Whether vein mining consumes tool durability
config.onekeyminer.stopOnLowDurability.t: Auto stop when tool durability is too low
config.onekeyminer.preserveDurability.to: Minimum durability to preserve before stopping
config.onekeyminer.requireExactMatch.too: Require exact block type match for chaining
config.onekeyminer.option.enable_harvest: Enable vein harvesting of mature crops with empty hand
config.onekeyminer.option.harvest_replan: Automatically replant crops after vein harvesting
